response.overview: In small-town Texas, affable and popular mortician Bernie Tiede strikes up a friendship with Marjorie Nugent, a wealthy widow well known for her sour attitude. When she becomes controlling and abusive, Bernie goes to great lengths to remove himself from her grasp.
response.tagline: A story so unbelievable it must be true.
response.title: Bernie

keywords.name: based on magazine, newspaper or article

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival
